title: Green Dreams
description: Bobby Kildare hates fish! Imagine his surprise when he finds himself the guest of honor at the Little People's seafood feast... — Eerie music plays on the strings of a magic zither. Can the strange instrument really foretell the future? — The dragon of Antrim strikes fear into the hearts of most people. But the dreadful beast meets his match in a lucky--and plucky--shepherd named Finn!Enter a delightful world of legend and folklore, where magic and mystery wait around every turn.
author: J.M.R. Meagher
